name: Good Job Creations
description: Good job creation is part of the Japanese listed Will, Good Job Creations has ambitious plans to monopolise the market in the region and to continue to attract top talent onboard the team.We are confident that our dynamic teamwork, positive attitude and personalised support will assist in the growth of both businesses and individuals.
features: Work with trial and error method
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Your Possibility, Our Passion
ShortDescription: Established in 2006, Good Job Creations has grown from its humble beginnings with a team of 3 members to its current standing as part of a growing organisation with global outreach.
enhanced_description: Good Job Creations, established in 2006, is part of the Japanese listed company, Will. Headquartered in Singapore, they aim to attract top talent and assist in the growth of both businesses and individuals through dynamic teamwork, positive attitude, and personalized support. With global outreach, their offerings encompass services like recruitment agencies and HR consulting providers, complemented by solutions in workforce management, HR management, and recruiting automation software, with a strong focus on building a more diverse and inclusive workforce by encouraging flexible learning and providing equivalence opportunities.
